articles.title: Israel Begins Allowing More Food Aid into Gaza Amid Starvation Crisis
articles.description: Over 100 trucks entered Gaza after nearly five months of Israel's near-total siege, addressing the severe malnutrition crisis affecting Palestinians, especially children.

articles.title: Trump Announces Trade Agreement with European Union
articles.description: President Trump announced a trade agreement with the European Union, imposing a 15% duty on most imports from the EU, about half of his latest threat.
